tests.title: verify login with unregistered email
tests.fullTitle: LoginPage Test Suite verify login with unregistered email
tests.code:
_HomePage.default.getLoginLink().click(); // Click the login link
_LoginPage.default.getEmailInputField();
_LoginPage.default.enterEmail("invalid_user@gmail.com"); // Enter invalid email
_LoginPage.default.clickRequestOTPbutton(); // Click the Request OTP button
_LoginPage.default.UnregisteredEmailToaster(); // Check if the toast notification is visible

tests.title: verify login with invalid or empty email
tests.fullTitle: LoginPage Test Suite verify login with invalid or empty email
tests.code:
_HomePage.default.getLoginLink().click(); // Click the login link
_LoginPage.default.getEmailInputField();
_LoginPage.default.enterEmail("test>"); // Enter empty email
_LoginPage.default.clickRequestOTPbutton(); // Click the Request OTP button
_LoginPage.default.InvalidEmailToaster(); // Check if the toast notification is visible
